Writer: Amanda Brown (characters), Eve Ahlert (story), Dennis Drake (story), Kate Kondell (story), Kate Kondell (screenplay)
Title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
Plot: Elle Woods heads to Washington D.C. to join the staff of a congresswoman in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.
Actors: Reese Witherspoon, Sally Field, Regina King, Jennifer Coolidge
